overview: After numerous attempts in many different time periods, the team has  successfully captured Vandal Savage. However, Savage tells Kendra that  he can reunite her with Carter so she struggles with whether she should  kill him. Rip decides they will deliver Savage to the Time Masters which  doesn’t sit well with Snart and Rory. The duo decides it may be time to  jump ship and return to their old life. Meanwhile, Savage taunts Ray  about his place in Kendra’s life.
